item.title: Who is this 'Chris Gibbons' guy then?
item.description: TL;DR What I do & specialise in HTML CSS (Sass) Responsive & Mobile-first UI/UX JavaScript (ES5+) Web Standards Web Accessibility What I don’t do or don’t do a lot of Backend development Design Heavy JavaScript OOP Fix printers (or other bits of IT equipment) A potted history Chris Gibbons is an experienced digital developer specialising in traditional front-end development practises, UI/UX and mobile. He has a passion/mild obsession for well written, semantic & accessible code.
